name: TapAndPlayUnsecuredService
description: Unsecured Service for the TapAndPlay system

scripts.invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --profile bacta --function-name $npm_package_config_functionName --region $npm_package_config_region --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --profile bacta --stack-name $npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackName --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region $npm_package_config_region
scripts.package-deploy: npm run package && npm run deploy
scripts.setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --profile bacta --bucket $npm_package_config_s3BucketName --region $npm_package_config_region || npm run create-bucket) && npm run package-deploy
scripts.win-invoke-lambda: aws lambda invoke --profile bacta --function-name %npm_package_config_functionName% --region %npm_package_config_region% --payload file://api-gateway-event.json lambda-invoke-response.json && cat lambda-invoke-response.json
scripts.win-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-sam.yaml --profile bacta --stack-name %npm_package_config_cloudFormationStackName% --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region %npm_package_config_region%
scripts.win-package-deploy: npm run win-package && npm run win-deploy
scripts.win-setup: npm install && (aws s3api get-bucket-location --profile bacta --bucket %npm_package_config_s3BucketName% --region %npm_package_config_region% || npm run win-create-bucket) && npm run win-package-deploy
scripts.LIVE-tp-us-package: aws cloudformation package --template ./cf-unsecured-service.yaml --profile gpt-LIVE --s3-bucket deployments.gamepaymenttechnology.co.uk --output-template cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --region eu-west-2
scripts.LIVE-tp-us-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --parameter-overrides EnvNameParam=LIVE PaymentProviderAccountParam=LIVE DbNameParam=LIVEgpt DbSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:511458576437:secret:liveDBCredentials-Hjlurs CyberSourceSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:511458576437:secret:LIVECybersourceKeys-FFRpNm CognitoUserPoolIdParam=eu-west-2_czoQv5IT7 CognitoAppClientIdParam=3pkcb8a7bktuf8fdbmgr8e24gv OperatorWalletToken=992f6a9d-9209-11eb-b758-065ea351134e DefaultSecurityGroupParam=sg-046e8f1185c169930 --template-file cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --profile gpt-LIVE --stack-name LIVE-TP-US-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2
scripts.LIVE-tp-us: npm run LIVE-replace-placeholders && npm run LIVE-tp-us-package && npm run LIVE-tp-us-deploy
scripts.tp-us-package: aws cloudformation package --template ./cf-unsecured-service.yaml --profile bacta --s3-bucket cloudformation.deploymentbucket.polarmoment.co.uk --output-template cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --region eu-west-2
scripts.demo-tp-us-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --parameter-overrides EnvNameParam=demo PaymentProviderAccountParam=test DbNameParam=demoTapAndPlay DbSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:devDBCredentials-auo0Xt CyberSourceSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:devCyberSourceKeys-vAoi4j CognitoUserPoolIdParam=eu-west-2_ZH8046VFe CognitoAppClientIdParam=4pp6v0257rrreben9aeas2nbr OperatorWalletToken=992f6a9d-9209-11eb-b758-065ea351134e DefaultSecurityGroupParam=sg-039918208324b61b0 --template-file cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --profile bacta --stack-name DEMO-TP-US-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2
scripts.demo-tp-us: npm run demo-replace-placeholders && npm run tp-us-package && npm run demo-tp-us-deploy
scripts.test-tp-us-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --parameter-overrides EnvNameParam=test PaymentProviderAccountParam=test DbNameParam=testTapAndPlay DbSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:devDBCredentials-auo0Xt CyberSourceSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:devCyberSourceKeys-vAoi4j CognitoUserPoolIdParam=eu-west-2_LrAls0rB7 CognitoAppClientIdParam=5flp2840eagvul48e810cr54ci OperatorWalletToken=992f6a9d-9209-11eb-b758-065ea351134e DefaultSecurityGroupParam=sg-039918208324b61b0 --template-file cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --profile bacta --stack-name TEST-TP-US-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2
scripts.test-tp-us: npm run test-replace-placeholders && npm run tp-us-package && npm run test-tp-us-deploy
scripts.live-test-tp-us-deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --parameter-overrides EnvNameParam=live-test PaymentProviderAccountParam=test DbNameParam=liveTestTapAndPlay DbSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:liveTestDevDBCredentials-I4SSU5 CyberSourceSecretKey=arn:aws:secretsmanager:eu-west-2:398738242332:secret:devCyberSourceKeys-vAoi4j OperatorWalletToken=992f6a9d-9209-11eb-b758-065ea351134e CognitoUserPoolIdParam=eu-west-2_WtXKyfSrk CognitoAppClientIdParam=454hl03gg0l1s4rtbht9ovonb8 DefaultSecurityGroupParam=sg-039918208324b61b0 --template-file cf-unsecured-service-packaged-sam.yaml --profile bacta --stack-name LIVE-TEST-TP-US-stack --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region eu-west-2
scripts.live-test-tp-us: npm run live-test-replace-placeholders && npm run tp-us-package && npm run live-test-tp-us-deploy
